ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: Glad I made 43 already hehe. I sometimes just run by the mobs again and let one take a swipe at me. Even if he hits for a lil bit, I don t have to retarget and
ygData.messageBody:
Glad I made 43 already hehe. I sometimes just run by the mobs again and let
one take a swipe at me. Even if he hits for a lil bit, I don't have to
retarget and tell my pet to attack. More often than not though my 850+ AC
causes them to miss anyway.

Arud Bastad
43 Bard on Bristlebane
-----Original Message-----

sentto-160851-24727-989587055-matosvr=theriver.com@...

om]On Behalf Of Matt DeBarger
Sent: Friday, May 11, 2001 6:21 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change


Well it clearly hurst charm kiting, but not so much group charming. At
least for me, I always mind wiped my pet then ordered him to reattack.
For
bards 27-42ish this is a real bite in the butt...
